means: 厚厚的一块( chunk的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: He broke the bread up into chunks and gave Meer a big one.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把面包掰成数块，给了米尔一块大的。

这些块(chunks)建立一个内存块(memory chunks)的链表。各自指向链表中的下一个块(chunk)。

entry.def: Chunks of something are thick solid pieces of it.

example.ex: They had to be careful of floating chunks of ice.
example.tran: 他们必须当心大块浮冰。

entry.def: A chunk of something is a large amount or large part of it.

example.ex: The company owns a chunk of farmland near Gatwick Airport.
example.tran: 该公司拥有盖特威克机场周边的大片农田。
